channel.title: FinalPkz|Spawn|PvM|Much more!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/27zagxv.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2reo11j.jpg[/img] [url=http://finalpkz.co.cc/world1.php]finalpkz.co.cc/world1.php[/url]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2qlbpl0.jpg[/img] [url=http://finalpkz.co.cc/Client.jar]finalpkz.co.cc/Client.jar[/url]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/16h2fbd.jpg[/img] [url=http://finalpkz.co.cc/smf]finalpkz.co.cc/smf[/url]
[SIZE=3]Features:[/SIZE]
*Spawning *Click to set levels *Quick spawn tab *You can earn everything, nothing is limited to donators *Clan Wars Pking *All Specials *All Spells Working 100% *HD Items and Characters *Recover Special Working *Killing Achievements *New Right Clicks *Faster Client Loading *Better Server Stability *100% Ancient Curses *A lot of commands *Perfect Hitsplats *All Weapon Specials 100% *Perfect Combat *New Items *Perfect Switching *Dicing *Perfect Clan Chat *Money Pouch *Exp Counter *VPS Hosted *24/7 Uptime *Loyalty Title shop, based on kills *100% working damage soaking *Working goliath gloves! *Much, much more, come check us out!
[SIZE=3]Media:[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4pckJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cLAAT.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/64WDs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uLZFV.png[/img] [/center]
[center]Updates: Barrows have been added, there is a chance you might get PvP items from the chest (Non-spawnables).
Tormented demons have been added, rare chance you might receive claws from them. Shout box has been added on site.
Special restores have been added to the PkP shop, they cost 3 PkP. Slayer is mostly done, tweaking some minor things before release. [/center]

[SIZE=3]Features:[/SIZE]

*Spawning
*Click to set levels
*Quick spawn tab
*You can earn everything, nothing is limited to donators
*Clan Wars Pking
*All Specials
*All Spells Working 100%
*HD Items and Characters
*Recover Special Working
*Killing Achievements
*New Right Clicks
*Faster Client Loading
*Better Server Stability
*100% Ancient Curses
*A lot of commands

*All Weapon Specials 100%
*Perfect Combat
*New Items
*Perfect Switching
*Dicing
*Perfect Clan Chat
*Money Pouch
*Exp Counter
*VPS Hosted
*24/7 Uptime
*Loyalty Title shop, based on kills

*Much, much more, come check us out!

[center]Updates:
Barrows have been added, there is a chance you might get PvP items from the chest (Non-spawnables).

Tormented demons have been added, rare chance you might receive claws from them. Shout box has been added on site.

Special restores have been added to the PkP shop, they cost 3 PkP. Slayer is mostly done, tweaking some minor things before release.
